channel.title: Ethics and Bias in Machine Learning: A Technical Study of What Makes Us 'Good' on Stat 150 at Cal Poly
channel.description: Recent content in Ethics and Bias in Machine Learning: A Technical Study of What Makes Us 'Good' on Stat 150 at Cal Poly

item.title: Bias in ML
item.description: We are living in a digital age. Machines have become fully integrated into our daily lives; phones, television, electric toothbrushes, you name it. The use of artificial intelligence in data studies is rapidly increasing. But what are the ethical consequences when this machinery is taken too far? The study “Ethics and Bias in Machine Learning: A Technical Study of What Makes Us ‘Good’” by Ashley Nicole Shadowen examines this ethical dilemma.
